name: Canto
desc: Can move again after certain actions.

name: Flying
desc: Can fly.

name: Strength +2
desc: Grants STR +2.

name: Strength +5
desc: Grants STR +5.

name: Resistance +5
desc: Grants RES +5.

name: Defense +5
desc: Grants DEF +5.

name: Speed +5
desc: Grants SPD +5.

name: Skill +5
desc: Grants SKL +5.

name: Luck +5
desc: Grants LCK +5.

name: Dragonstone
desc: Grants STR +12, SKL +12, DEF +15, RES+20.

name: Poisoned
desc: Inflicts -2 to all stats.

name: Resist+
desc: Grants additional RES.

name: Stoneskin
desc: Take half damage but inflicts -2 SPD.

name: Stunned
desc: Unit cannot act.

name: Sleep
desc: Unit is asleep.

name: Petrify
desc: Unit is petrified. Cannot avoid enemy attacks and suffers -30 dodge.

name: Rescue
desc: Unit is weighed down with a traveler.

name: Steal
desc: Can steal items from enemies with lower speed.

name: Locktouch
desc: Unit can opened locks without a key.

name: Crit +30
desc: Grants +30 Critical change

name: Crit +15
desc: Grants +15 Critical change

name: Anticrit
desc: Grants immunity to critical hits.

name: Wretched Air
desc: Grants STR +10, SKL +10, DEF +10, RES +10.

name: Demon Light
desc: Grants MAG +10, SKL +10, LCK +10, DEF +10, RES +15.

name: Ravager
desc: Grants STR +15, SKL +15, DEF +15, RES +15.

name: Silence
desc: Unit cannot use magic.

name: Berserk
desc: Unit is confused and can no longer tell friend from foe.

name: Torch
desc: Grants increased sight range in fog of war.

name: Void Curse
desc: No exp gained for attacking this unit.

name: Inspiration
desc: Aura - Grants +1 damage and +1 resist to allies.

name: Inspired
desc: Grants +1 damage and +1 resist.

name: Death Blow
desc: Unit deals +6 damage, when initiating combat.

name: Assertive Blow
desc: Unit deals +4 damage and gains +20 hit, when initiating combat.

name: Certain Blow
desc: Unit gains +30 hit, when initiating combat.

name: Swift Sparrow
desc: Unit deals +4 damage and gains +4 Spd, when initiating combat.

name: Duelist's Blow
desc: Unit gains +30 avoid, when initiating combat.

name: Darting Blow
desc: Unit gains +6 AS, when initiating combat.

name: Armored Blow
desc: Unit gains +6 Def, when initiating combat.

name: Brutish Blow
desc: Unit deals +4 damage and gains +4 Def, when initiating combat.

name: Warding Blow
desc: Unit gains +9 Res, when initiating combat.

name: Mirrored Blow
desc: Unit deals +4 damage and gains +6 Res, when initiating combat.

name: Fierce Stance
desc: If foe initiates combat, unit gains +6 damage.

name: Swift Stance
desc: If foe initiates combat, unit gains +6 Spd.

name: Sturdy Stance
desc: If foe initiates combat, unit gains +6 Def.

name: Frenzy
desc: For every 4 HP below max HP, unit will deal +1 damage.

name: Inhale
desc: Unit will take no damage from attack. Charge 2.

name: Starburst Stream
desc:
Ultimate. A 50 hit combo at half damage.
Unit can miss, can't crit and uses durability.

name: Firey Blood
desc: Grants the user +4 damage, if units HP is not full.

name: Safegaurd
desc: If unit has more RES than foe, unit gains +6 Def and Res.

name: Spectre
desc: Ultimate. Unit gains bonus to Avoid and Dodge. Bonus decreses every subsequent attack.

name: Spirit Bomb
desc:
Ultimate. Unit does an AOE attack on the enemy.
Adjacent allies make this attack more powerful.

name: Wadle Dee Army
desc: Ultimate. User summons 5 disposable units.

name: Cloberin Time
desc: Unit gain +1 Dmg, +10 Hit and +5 Crit when weilding a hammer.
components: 1 if unit.get_weapon().nid == 'Hammer' or unit.get_weapon().nid == 'Star Hammer' else 0
10 if unit.get_weapon().nid == 'Hammer' or unit.get_weapon().nid == 'Star Hammer' else 0
5 if unit.get_weapon().nid == 'Hammer' or unit.get_weapon().nid == 'Star Hammer' else 0

name: Fury
desc: Unit gains +2 Str, Skl, Spd, Def and Res, but unit takes 6 damage after every combat.

name: Sol
desc: Unit restores half of damage dealt as HP. Charge 2

name: Luna
desc: Unit negates foes Def/Res. Charge 2.

name: Moonbow
desc: Unit negates half of foes Def/Res. Charge 1.

name: Moonbow
desc: Def ingone percentage is not correct.

name: Astra
desc: Unit attacks 5 times at half damage. Charge 3.

name: Dragon Fang
desc: Adds 30% of units Str to damage dealt. Charge 2.

name: Galeforce
desc: Allow unit to move again after combat. Charge 3.

name: Corona
desc: User deals 1.5x damage and negates foes Avoid and Dodge. Charge 2.

name: Pavise
desc: Unit negates an attack from a sword, lance or axe. Charge 1.

name: Pavise
components: 999 if target.get_weapon() and item_system.weapon_type(target, target.get_weapon()) in ('Sword', 'Lance', 'Axe') else 0

name: Aegis
desc: Unit negates an attack from a bow, magic, etc. Charge 1.

name: Aegis
components: 999 if target.get_weapon() and item_system.weapon_type(target, target.get_weapon()) in ('Bow', 'Light', 'Anima', 'Dark') else 0

name: Defiant Str
desc: User gains +6 damage when under 50% HP.

name: Defiant Crit
desc: User gains +30 Crit when under 50% HP.

name: Defiant Avoid
desc: User gains +6 damage when under 50% HP.

name: Vantage
desc: User will always attack first, if under 50% HP.

name: Impale
desc: Unit gets a garenteed critical hit. Charge 2.

name: Renewal
desc: Unit restores 30% of HP at the beginning of their turn.

name: Steadfast
desc: For every 4 HP below max HP, foes deal -1 damage.

name: Avoid +10
desc: Grants user Avoid +10.

name: Charge
desc: Unit gains +1 damage for every 2 spaces moved.
components: max(0, utils.calculate_distance(unit.position, unit.previous_position) // 2) if unit.position and mode in ('attack', 'splash') else 0

name: Deterence
desc: Unit takes -1 damage from foes for every space moved.
components: max(0, utils.calculate_distance(unit.position, unit.previous_position)) if unit.position and mode in ('attack', 'splash') else 0

name: Momentum
desc: Unit gains +2 crit for every space moved.
components: max(0, utils.calculate_distance(unit.position, unit.previous_position) * 2) if unit.position and mode in ('attack', 'splash') else 0

name: Pass
desc: Allow unit to move through enemy occupied spaces.

name: Blessing
desc: When unit attacks, allies within 2 spaces are healed for 50% HP.

name: Sure Strike
desc: Unit gains +40 Hit and deals 1.5x damage. Charge 1.

name: Full Heal
desc: Heals literally everyone
